item.title: Hire me
item.description:
==> Unveiling Excellence in Software Consulting:

Hello üëãüèª, I’m Adan, a seasoned software consultant with a rich portfolio spanning over two decades in the tech and finance industry. My journey has been marked by a passion for crafting solutions that not only meet but exceed the expectations of high-demand clients in sectors where precision, security, and innovation are non-negotiable.

My Expertise:

  • Data Collection: I’ve engineered systems that gather, process, and analyze data with an efficiency that turns raw information into actionable insights. My work has empowered organizations to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

item.title: About
item.description:
==> Introducing Adan: Your Expert Consultant in Technology and Beyond

Welcome to my digital space! I’m Adan, a multifaceted consultant with a strong academic background and years of practical experience. Here’s a snapshot of my qualifications:

  • Master’s Degree in Stock Markets and Derivatives.
  • Master’s in General Navy Corp.
  • MicroMaster in Software Development.
  • Engineer Certificate in Industrial Engineering.

My career has taken me through diverse sectors:

  • Data Collection & Analysis.
  • Machine Learning & AI.
  • Finance.
  • Cybersecurity.

I’ve worked with elite clients, including hedge funds, AI medical device companies, and cybersecurity firms, where I’ve delivered custom software solutions that stand up to the highest demands.
